name: Saunderson
review: Marc was a great help and gave very detailed information on my tax requirements. He was very prompt in responding to all my questions, and definitely made sure I was aware of all my requirements for tax compliance as an expat. It was certainly a great experience speaking with Marc, and no doubt I'd be in great hands if my taxes were handled by Marc and the Protax team.

name: Doria
review: Marc was extremely informative and helpful. He laid out what I needed to be tax compliant and was able to ease my concerns. He did his research and was able to give me country specific information about my current situation. Everything was explained simply and easily

name: Maxy
review: This is the most recommended consultancy agency around the town
